Tickets, Entry & Pricing: Boat tours to famous points cost Rs 300-400 per person.
Kayaking costs approximately Rs 300 for a solo ride and Rs 500 for a two-person ride per hour.
Boat rides covering Honeymoon Beach, Butterfly Beach, Tortoise Rock, Dolphin show, and Monkey Island range from Rs 700 to Rs 1000 per person (negotiable).
Car parking costs Rs 300 until 5 PM.
Boat rides in the backwater area cost ₹800 to ₹1000 for 4 or 5 people (negotiable).
